title: Custom Word Filters / Censors
body:
Hi there Riot staffs,

Just an idea to add a feature in game for players to set the word filters/censors.
This way the player can add certain words to be censored.

This is in regards to the thread [Proposed change to the Punishment system](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/c3Yjc7Q8-proposed-change-to-the-punishment-system)
What do you think?
